resources.string: "Fully encrypted email client perfectly synced with Mudita Space ecosystem.",
Strong security (OAuth2).This app won\'t store and transmit mail password.
Strong security (app-specific password). The app will store only the one-time password generated for it specifically.
Strong security (OAuth2).This app won\'t store and transmit mail password.
Security level depending on e-mail provider. You will need to provide your general password or an app-specific password, depending on particular e-mail provider\'s settings.
HOW TO GENERATE AN APP-SPECIFIC PASSWORD
